name: Nyasha Beach
description:
Meet beautiful girls and spend time in their company dealing with scattered pieces of their memories. You will meet with such girls as Eumi, who is 22 years old, another girlfriend Yasu, who is 20 and other girls from 18 to 23.

The game is a classic puzzle. You have to go through all ten stages, as well as three levels of difficulty, in which pleasant surprises await you ;-)

- Puzzle Game

- Artworks

- Nice music

- Steam achievements

Keyboard H: Complete Level
